channel.title: Need help with a 667 rsps
channel.description:
I'm positive its possible because the dung is capped out at 120, but I was wondering if anyone knew how to make all skills cap out at 120 instead of 99. Also I would like to know if anyone knew how to make a pvp zone on a 667 all the tutorials I see are for 317 and I've tried that concept to no avail.
Edit: I still need help with these two things could someone help me would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Need help with a 667 rsps
item.dc:creator: @Adam200214 Adam200214
item.description:
@Adam200214 wrote:

server side - Skills.java
replace

	public int getLevelForXp(int skill) {
		double exp = xp[skill];
		int points = 0;
		int output = 0;
		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= (skill == DUNGEONEERING ? 120 : 99); lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
					* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
			if ((output - 1) >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return skill == DUNGEONEERING ? 120 : 99;
	}

with

	public int getLevelForXp(int skill) {
		double exp = xp[skill];
		int points = 0;
		int output = 0;
		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= (skill == DUNGEONEERING ? 120 : 120); lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
					* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
			if ((output - 1) >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return skill == DUNGEONEERING ? 120 : 120;
	}

Read full topic
